name: nethack-godot
description: Nethack for the web using godot as the UI.

scripts.setup:nethack: cd NetHack/sys/unix && ./setup.sh hints/linux.370 && cd ../.. && make fetch-lua
scripts.copy:nethack: cd NetHack && cp targets/wasm/nethack.js targets/wasm/nethack.wasm targets/wasm/nethack.data ../lib
scripts.fix:nethack: sed -i '/var ENV = {}/a Module.ENV = ENV; Module.FS = FS;' ./lib/nethack.js
scripts.build:js: rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp lib/nethack.wasm lib/nethack.data build
scripts.build: npm run build:godot && npm run build:js
